mapper.insert: insert into info_book (id, name, description, author, press, press_time, price, add_time) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{author}, #{press}, #{pressTime}, #{price}, #{addTime})
mapper.select: select id from info_book order by ${arg0} limit #{arg1}, #{arg2}
select id from info_book order by ${arg0} desc limit #{arg1}, #{arg2}
